values: 节日；假期；假日；休假日；出外度假时期；法定节假日；公共假日；公众假日；<英>（一年中带薪的）年假；（Holiday）霍利戴（人名）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指按规定不工作的各种假日，时间可长可短。在英国复数形式表示较长的假期。
主要指政府机关工作人员或军队人员获准的休假、假期。
通常指时间较长的假期，如学校的寒暑假等。
指公众庆祝、欢度的节日。

word_group.brief_definition: 公共假日；公共节日；公共节假日
银行假日, 公共假日 (如圣诞节、元旦等)
以观看别人受苦为乐的娱乐；得自他人受苦的欢乐
国定假期；国家性假日；全国性的节日
漫长的假期；很长的假期；长时间的假期

bilingual.source: What will you do on your holiday?
I always have fun on my holiday.
I read lots of books on holiday.

list.abstract: holiday（英 [ˈhɒlədeɪ]，美 [ˈhɑːlədeɪ]），英语单词，作名词用，为假期；节假日；暂缓缴付期；（Holiday）人名：霍利戴。作动词用，为在…度假。短语搭配有summer holiday（暑假），例句为“I'm going to visit Chengdu this summer holiday.（这个暑假我打算去成都旅游）”。 holiday名词类近义词有festival、Feriae。
《holiday》是由郑秀文演唱的专辑，专辑里郑秀文还开始和香港的其他一些出色的音乐人合作，如伦永亮、C.Y.Kong、麦皓轮等；甚至还翻唱了美国音乐大师D.Warren的作品。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the airport. Goodbye. Have a lovely holiday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是机场。再见！假期愉快。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the airport. Goodbye. Have a lovely holiday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是机场。再见！假期愉快。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George are fast asleep in their holiday house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治在他们假期的房子里很快就睡着了。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George are fast asleep in their holiday house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治在他们假期的房子里很快就睡着了。

yingyinNormal.en: The Holiday House
yingyinNormal.zh: 假期的家

yingyinNormal.en: Holiday in the Sun
yingyinNormal.zh: 阳光假期

yingyinNormal.en: The Holiday House
yingyinNormal.zh: 第4季第37集《假期的家》

yingyinNormal.en: Holiday in the Sun
yingyinNormal.zh: 第4季第38集《阳光假期》

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, Polly. Are you having a nice holiday? Hello, Polly. Are you having a nice holiday?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好啊，波莉。你的假期过得不错吧？你好啊，波莉。你的假期过得不错吧？

yingyinNormal.en: It is the first morning of Peppa and her family's holiday in Italy. Holiday. Daddy Pig is up, bright and early.
yingyinNormal.zh: 啊！假期！猪爸爸起来了，天很早已经亮了。

yingyinNormal.en: It is the first morning of Peppa and her family's holiday in Italy. Holiday. Daddy Pig is up, bright and early.
yingyinNormal.zh: 啊！假期！猪爸爸起来了，天很早已经亮了。

yingyinNormal.en: Here we are. Peppa and her family have arrived at their holiday house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们到啦。佩奇和她的家人到了，假期的房子。

yingyinNormal.en: Here we are. Peppa and her family have arrived at their holiday house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们到啦。佩奇和她的家人到了，假期的房子。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her family have arrived back at their holiday house. Time for bed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和她的家人返回到假期的房子里了。该睡觉了。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her family have arrived back at their holiday house. Time for bed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和她的家人返回到假期的房子里了。该睡觉了。

yingyinNormal.en: But you have to know, we're going to visit you here every holiday. That's fine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你要知道，我们每个假期都会来探望你。这很好。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her family are flying through the sky, on their way to a sunny holiday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和她的家人飞过天空，一路去向一个天晴的假期。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her family are flying through the sky, on their way to a sunny holiday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和她的家人飞过天空，一路去向一个天晴的假期。

yingyinNormal.en: For some, the days they take off now are the only holiday they get all year, so they are prepared to travel a long way for a long time to get home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对有些人来说，这几日假期是他们一整年来唯一的假期，因此他们准备来花很长时间，千里迢迢赶回家中。

yingyinNormal.en: What have you got in this bag, Mummy Pig? It's all important stuff for our holiday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你包里有什么，猪妈妈？这是为假期准备的很重要的东西。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 假日; 假期; 度假

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a special day of celebration during which schools and businesses are often closed
sense_info_list.zh: 假日; 假期; 度假

examination_example.sentence: Not everyone will agree with the authors' policy ideas, which range from mandating more <highlight>holiday</highlight> time to reducing tax incentives for American homebuyers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 并非所有人都会同意作者的政策想法，这些想法包括强制规定更多的假期时间，以及减少对美国购房者的税收优惠。

examination_example.sentence: Politicians have repeatedly "backloaded" public-sector pay deals, keeping the pay increases modest but adding to <highlight>holidays</highlight> and especially pensions that are already generous.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政客们一再“积压”公共部门的薪酬协议，保持适度的加薪，但增加了假期，尤其是已经很慷慨的养老金。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 假日; 假期; 休假

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 假日; 假期; 休假

examination_example.sentence: What does the man say about his <highlight>holiday</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这名男子是如何谈论他的假期的？

examination_example.sentence: There is no reason why visitors to the UK, or domestic tourists on <highlight>holiday</highlight> in hotspots such as Cornwall, should be exempt from taxation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到英国的游客，或在康沃尔等热点地区度假的国内游客，没有任何理由可以免于纳税。

examination_example.sentence: One relative bright spot for Macy's during the <highlight>holiday</highlight> season was the online channel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 假日季中梅西百货公司的一个相对亮点是在线方式。

word_usage.usage: on holidays 里的 holidays 指元旦、国庆节等放假日, in the holidays 里的 holidays 指 "假期"。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指公众庆祝、欢度的节日。
指按规定不工作的各种假日, 时间可长可短。在英国复数形式表示较长的假期。
主要指政府机关工作人员或军队人员获准的休假、假期。

examination_example.sentence: How long does the woman want to go for the <highlight>holiday</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位女士想去度假多长时间？

examination_example.sentence: I'm interested in booking a <highlight>holiday</highlight> to Australia and wonder if you could tell me what deals you have.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我有兴趣安排去澳大利亚的假期，不知道你能否告诉我你们有什么协议。

examination_example.sentence: What does the woman say she likes about the <highlight>holiday</highlight> package?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个女人说她喜欢度假套餐的什么？

examination_example.sentence: During my last winter <highlight>holiday</highlight>, I went to the countryside with my father to visit my grandparents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我最后一个寒假，我和爸爸去农村看望我的祖父母。

examination_example.sentence: I was, nevertheless, talked into going on another fun-filled <highlight>holiday</highlight> in the wilderness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管如此，我还是被说服去进行另一次充满乐趣的荒野之旅。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 公共假日；公共节日；公共节假日

examination_example.sentence: Although it’s a public <highlight>holiday</highlight> today, some firefighters in our city are still on duty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然今天是公共假日，但我们城市的一些消防员仍在执勤。

examination_example.sentence: What are you going to do this summer <highlight>holiday</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个暑假你打算做什么？

examination_example.sentence: All in all, relax and have a wonderful <highlight>holiday</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总而言之，放松一下，度过一个美好的假期。

word_usage.usage: holiday多用在英式英语中，美式英语中多用vacation。
